title: The Centre & Shop
cleaned_text: Our wonderful team and us, believe our centre is a safe haven, away from the hustle & bustle of the outside world. As soon as you step into the centre, we love you to feel welcome and enveloped in a Healing Hug. You can come in to wind down and chill out in our comfortable environment, where as soon as you walk in, the aroma and environment welcomes you, as [our therapists](https://therapy4life.net/about/therapists/) invite you to de-stress, relax, find peace, healing and pain release using a variety of [treatments](https://therapy4life.net/treatments/) for the mind, body, soul and spirit. We are here to meet your individual therapy needs and give you the treatment you need. We also have a [FAR Infrared Sauna](https://therapy4life.net/body-treatments/sauna/) which is popular, both with those having treatments or just enjoying the sauna for its health properties.
